title: Pset_DiscreteAccessoryCornerFixingPlate
description: Properties specific to corner fixing plates.

CornerFixingPlateLength.title: CornerFixingPlateLength
CornerFixingPlateLength.description: The length of the L-shaped corner plate.

CornerFixingPlateThickness.title: CornerFixingPlateThickness
CornerFixingPlateThickness.description: The thickness of the L-shaped corner plate.

CornerFixingPlateFlangeWidthInPlaneZ.title: CornerFixingPlateFlangeWidthInPlaneZ
CornerFixingPlateFlangeWidthInPlaneZ.description: The flange width of the L-shaped corner plate in plane Z.

CornerFixingPlateFlangeWidthInPlaneX.title: CornerFixingPlateFlangeWidthInPlaneX
CornerFixingPlateFlangeWidthInPlaneX.description: The flange width of the L-shaped corner plate in plane X.
